publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2337# Robin Harper: Scottish Science Library-That the Parliament notes the irreplaceable and valuable service that the Scottish Science Library contributes to the advancement of science in Scotland; further notes the Scottish Executive's recently declared support for science through the first ever science strategy, A Science Strategy for Scotland, including encouragement of public interest in science; further notes with concern the announcement of the imminent closure of the library, and expresses the hope that the Executive will take action to prevent the library from closing. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*
S1M-2337# Scottish Science Library (lodged on 22 October 2001) Stewart Stevenson*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2337# Scottish Science Library (lodged on 22 October 2001) Michael Russell*

S1M-2337# Scottish Science Library (lodged on 22 October 2001) Donald Gorrie*

S1M-2337# Scottish Science Library (lodged on 22 October 2001) Dennis Canavan*, Ms Sandra White*
